howToExplanaiton: Browse, choose, and thrive in the best local spots for you, curated with real-time insights from other digital nomads

howItWorks.description: Experience the quick and ease way to locate your ideal spot
howItWorks.benefit: Save time and get back to what matters—your Coffi.

chooseYourTypeOfPlace.title: Choose The Type of Place
chooseYourTypeOfPlace.description: Start by selecting the type of environment that suits your current need
chooseYourTypeOfPlace.howItWorks: Whether it’s a café, coworking space, library, or something unique, select an environment that aligns with today’s needs.

setYourPreferences.title: Set Your Preferences
setYourPreferences.description: Customize your search based on specific rules and accommodations
setYourPreferences.howItWorks: Filter amenities like high-speed Wi-Fi, seating availability, and more to suit your preferences.

communityInsights.title: Community Insights
communityInsights.description: Access and filter real-time insights given from the community.
communityInsights.howItWorks: Leverage the power of our community with real-time updates about crowd levels, noise, and many more.

matchYourFavoriteSpots.title: Match Your Favorite Spots
matchYourFavoriteSpots.description: Whether you seek a quiet corner for deep focus or a lively space to spark creativity, access a wide range of quality-assured locations. Find environments tailored to enhance both your productivity and lifestyle.

realConnections.title: Real Connections, Right Where You Are
realConnections.description: Coffi helps you connect with like-minded digital nomads in the city you're staying in.
realConnections.2ndDescription: Join a global tribe where you can network, exchange insights, and build relationships that enhance both your work and travels.

poweredByCommunity.title: Powered by Community,
poweredByCommunity.subTitle: Designed for You
poweredByCommunity.description: Coffi thrives on its vibrant community of digital nomads, making real-time insights possible.
poweredByCommunity.2ndDescription: By updating conditions or discovering new spots, you earn Coffi Points—redeemable for rewards like coupons.
poweredByCommunity.3rdDescription: Join Coffi Premium to connect with the community, earn rewards, and never miss out on the best places for work or relaxation.

subscriptions.description: Whether you're starting your adventure or diving deep into the nomadic lifestyle, Coffi has a plan for you.

explorer.title: Explorer
explorer.description: Start your journey with the basics, no strings attached.
explorer.priceText: Forever! you just need an account.
explorer.why: Embrace your Coffi adventure with access to all official spots and basic filters, perfect for discovering the essentials of your city

benefits.basicFilters: Filter by type, rules, and amenities
benefits.realTimeInsights: Access to Real-time insights from the community
benefits.noCreditOrDebitCard: No credit or debit card required

nomad.title: Nomad
nomad.description: Unlock the full Coffi experience with insights and rewards.
nomad.why: Go beyond exploration with access to community-discovered spots, real-time insights, and Coffi Points.

benefits.officialAndCommunitySpotsAccess: Access all official and community-discovered spots

wanderlust.title: Wanderlust
wanderlust.description: For the true adventurer, ready to redefine their journey.
wanderlust.working: We’re working hard to improve really fast.
wanderlust.why: The ultimate plan for ambitious nomads, offering advanced personalization and features to elevate your Coffi experience.

callToActionBanner.title: Your Next Favorite Spot is Waiting
callToActionBanner.description: Dive into Coffi and uncover the best spots in your city, perfectly matched to your lifestyle. Don’t wait—start now!

purpose.description: We’re more than a platform—it’s a mission. Our goal is to make the nomadic lifestyle easier, better, and more connected. Whether it’s finding the perfect spot, building a community, or inspiring others to thrive on the road, Coffi is here to support every step of your journey.
